answers.answer: I'm 26w5d with a babygirl had my anatomy scan done about 2 weeks ago and she was 1lb 12 ounces
35 weeks with a 6.5 lb baby boy
How do u find out the weight of ur baby?
Had a scan done at 34 weeks almost 35 and my little girl only weighed 4 pound 9 oz but she is being monitored due to her size ... another ultrasound Tuesday and 37 weeks
When i was 23weeks 6days my son was 1lb 13 oz. So I'm most likely gonna have a big baby. He's 2 weeks ahead of schedule
At 29 weeks my little girl was 2lb 13oz, I'm nearly 35 weeks now and due for a scan in a week n half.
Just had a scan. Im 37 weeks and baby boy is only 5lbs. Docs are monitoring him since hes little.
My babies just been born at 37 weeks and weighs 5lb 1oz
Im 32 weeks he weighs 3lbs 10oz my next appt I will see if he is growing because he was a little behind.
I had a scan done at 37 weeks and he was 6lbs 11oz. Im supposed to be induced Wednesday and I will be 42 weeks so I'm kinda terrified that he's gonna be huge lol

question: So I'm 36 weeks and baby weighs 6 lbs 10 oz... For some reason I'm scared I'm gonna end up with a really big baby. But cos of my gestational diabetes I'm going to be induced so I won't be going over my due date. But anywhoo how many weeks are you ladies and how much does baby weigh :)
title: How Many Weeks & How Much Does Baby Weigh? ♡
